titles: Complaints Containing sundrie small poemes of the worlds vanitie. VVhereof the next page maketh mention. By Ed. Sp.
author: Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599.
publisher: Imprinted for VVilliam Ponsonbie, dwelling in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Bishops head,
notes: "The teares of the muses", "Prosopopoia", and "Muiopotmos" each have separate title pages, the last dated 1590; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
